mapper.insert: INSERT INTO con.concpservicem( tenant_id, cp_cd, service_cd, service_start_dt, service_end_dt, service_url_addr, rep_color_value, fst_lang_cd, scnd_lang_cd, thrd_lang_cd, foth_lang_cd, fith_lang_cd, test_lab_use_yn, test_lab_remark_desc, test_event_add_yn, test_event_remark_desc, crt_id, crt_ip, ad_date, udt_id, udt_ip, udt_date) VALUES (#{tenantId}, #{cpCd}, #{serviceCd}, #{serviceStartDt}, #{serviceEndDt}, #{serviceUrlAddr}, #{repColorValue}, #{fstLangCd}, #{scndLangCd}, #{thrdLangCd}, #{fothLangCd}, #{fithLangCd}, #{testLabUseYn}, #{testLabRemarkDesc}, #{testEventAddYn}, #{testEventRemarkDesc}, #{crtId}, #{crtIp}, current_timestamp, #{udtId}, #{udtIp}, current_timestamp)

INSERT INTO con.concpserviced( tenant_id, cp_cd, service_cd, system_cd, service_start_dt, service_end_dt, service_url_addr, crt_id, crt_ip, ad_date, udt_id, udt_ip, udt_date) VALUES (#{tenantId}, #{cpCd}, #{serviceCd}, #{systemCd}, #{serviceStartDt}, #{serviceEndDt}, #{serviceUrlAddr}, #{crtId}, #{crtIp}, current_timestamp, #{udtId}, #{udtIp}, current_timestamp)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) OVER() AS totalCount, servicem.tenant_id AS tenantId, servicem.cp_cd AS cpCd, servicem.service_cd AS serviceCd, servicem.ad_date AS adDate, cpm.cp_nm AS cpNm, cpm.cp_start_dt AS cpStartDt, cpm.cp_end_dt AS cpEndDt FROM (SELECT tenant_id, cp_cd, STRING_AGG(service_cd,',') as service_cd, max(ad_date) as ad_date FROM con.concpservicem group by tenant_id, cp_cd ) AS servicem INNER JOIN con.concpm AS cpm ON servicem.tenant_id = cpm.tenant_id AND servicem.cp_cd = cpm.cp_cd ORDER BY cpm.tenant_id desc LIMIT #{rowPerPage} OFFSET #{skipCount}

SELECT tenant_id AS tenantId, cp_cd AS cpCd, service_cd AS serviceCd, service_start_dt AS serviceStartDt, service_end_dt AS serviceEndDt, service_url_addr AS serviceUrlAddr, rep_color_value AS repColorValue, fst_lang_cd AS fstLangCd, scnd_lang_cd AS scndLangCd, thrd_lang_cd AS thrdLangCd, foth_lang_cd AS fothLangCd, fith_lang_cd AS fithLangCd, test_lab_use_yn AS testLabUseYn, test_lab_remark_desc AS testLabRemarkDesc, test_event_add_yn AS testEventAddYn, test_event_remark_desc AS testEventRemarkDesc FROM con.concpservicem servicem WHERE servicem.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND servicem.cp_cd = #{cpCd}

SELECT tenant_id AS tenantId, cp_cd AS cpCd, service_cd AS serviceCd, system_cd AS systemCd, cdd.cd_nm AS systemNm, service_start_dt AS serviceStartDt, service_end_dt AS serviceEndDt, service_url_addr AS serviceUrlAddr FROM con.concpserviced serviced LEFT OUTER JOIN con.concdd cdd ON serviced.system_cd = cdd.cd_id AND cdd.cd_group_id = serviced.service_cd ||'_SYSTEM_CD' WHERE serviced.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND serviced.cp_cd = #{cpCd}
